sentences.en: As a consequence, alcohol , drugs and prostitution are endemic.
sentences.cn: 随之而来的后果, 是当地?锢牡男锞莆?竞吐粢?

sentences.en: Can ye give to prostitution its former innocence?
sentences.cn: 你们能不能把过去的纯洁还给娼妓 呢 ?

sentences.en: Despite its title the film has absolute nothing to do with prostitution.
sentences.cn: 但对影迷来说,也许更重要的是此片乃法斯宾达自认最好的个人作品.

sentences.en: For the Tattaglia Family dealt in women. Its main'business was prostitution.
sentences.cn: 这是因为塔塔格里亚家族经营的是买卖妇女的生意.

sentences.en: He grows restless , seducing a manicurist and pressing her to prostitution.
sentences.cn: 不料这个穷极无聊的男人竟然另外引诱一名修指甲女郎去当妓女,其后东窗事发而入狱.
他也搞一点妓女买卖,很霸道.

sentences.en: He refused the job, saying it would be prostitution of his talents.
sentences.cn: 他拒不做那工作, 说那是大材小用.

sentences.en: Many women were forced into prostitution.
Prostitution is a profession that devastates the lives of young women.
sentences.cn: 雏妓这个职业是对女孩子极度的摧残.

sentences.en: Tran - uil pleasant Hyde Park, London Fort appearance so you do wash turned to prostitution.
sentences.cn: 恬静宜人的海德公园 、 伦敦堡外观让您尽洗千里风尘.

sentences.en: You were engaged in negotiating an act of prostitution, were you not?
sentences.cn: 当时你在和嫖客讨价还价是不是?

trans.tran_cn: 卖淫，滥用某事物，出卖灵魂
